channel.title: [508 Server] Error Running Lists

item.title: [508 Server] Error Running Lists
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

Whenever i run a 508 server i get error, i had problems running 508/503 servers but i made a run.cmd and with that i can run the servers but i get that error.

@echo off
@title RuneFusion Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./bin palidino76.rs2.Server 43594
pause

Starting server on port: 43594
Error loading banned hosts list.
Error loading banned users list.
Error loading item list.
Error loading stackable list.
Error loading equipment list.
Error loading NPC Lists.
Error loading NPCs.

Read full topic
